channel.title: Server listening on 0.0.0.0?
channel.description: I am having issues with my friend trying to get on my server through my client. when i run the server from my computer it says it is listening on port 0.0.0.0... how do i change that to my server...?

item.title: Server listening on 0.0.0.0?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

0.0.0.0 is localHost/127.0.0.1 - your computer. First of all it is not a port, it’s an IP.

You need to setup a No-IP which can be found in the tutorials section. It explains how to add your IP and let others connect too.

It’s a sticky at the top of the tutorial section.

And this is server help, not client.

Read full topic
